full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 753 Filed 08/10/22 Page 25 of 264 1451 LC7VMAX1 Meder - direct 1 A. On the left, Jeffrey Epstein; on the right, Ghislaine Maxwell. 2 3 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, let's go now please to 4 Government Exhibit 324 just for the witness, the parties, and 5 the Court. 6 Q. Do you recognize this? 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. What is it? 9 A. It's a photo from a CD I reviewed from the Epstein and 10 Maxwell investigation. 11 Q. Under what 1B number was that CD logged? 12 A. 1B19. 13 Q. Who's in this photograph? 14 A. Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. 15 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers this in 16 evidence. 17 THE COURT: Consistent with my ruling, GX-324 is 18 admitted. You may publish. 19 (Government's Exhibit 324 received in evidence) 20 MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. 21 Q. Who's on the left and who's on the right? 22 A. On the left, Jeffrey Epstein; on the right, Ghislaine 23 Maxwell. 24 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, let's go now to Government 25 Exhibit 325, please, for the Court, the parties, and the SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013038
